Package io.cloudstate.javasupport

Interface EntityContext

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Context
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    CommandContext, CommandContext, CrdtContext, CrdtCreationContext, EventContext, EventSourcedContext, EventSourcedEntityCreationContext, SnapshotContext, StreamCancelledContext, StreamedCommandContext<Output>, SubscriptionContext
    public interface EntityContext
extends Context
    Root context for all contexts that pertain to entities, that is, things that are addressable via an entity id.

    • Method Summary

      The id of the entity that this context is for.
